bug.author: adam-rysanek
bug.summary: [Bug] Request to re-open: SpectralMixtureKernel initialize_from_data CUDA bug
bug.description: I've written a comment on <denchmark-link:https://github.com/cornellius-gp/gpytorch/issues/737>#737</denchmark-link> . I am able to replicate that issue, and the advice suggested doesn't seem to work for me. I'm creating this new issue just to draw attention it to the response.
